ValidationRule.description: Once the requirement reaches status Approved:Approved to Deploy the field needs to be mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL (Status__c, "Approve: Approved to Deploy"), ISPICKVAL (Status__c, "Release: Design"), ISPICKVAL (Status__c, "Release: Build") ), ISBLANK(Planned_Build_Completion_Date__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Planned Build Completion Date required once requirement is approved
